message: Let's split it 50/50 to get it over with!
I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a small share
That's not generous enough! I want a bigger share.
Meet me in the middle, Bob! 40% for me, 60% for you.
I'll take a bit more, but I'll still give you a decent share
That's still too skewed towards you, Bob. I want a bigger share.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share. 45% for me, 55% for you.
I'm not giving up, I'll take a bigger share, but you'll still get something
That's still way too skewed towards you, Bob. I'm not going to give up that easily.
Let's go back to a 50/50 split. It's the fairest way to end this.
